typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CoopID as string,
		CoopName as string,
		ProdID as integer,
		ProdName as string,
		ManifestNum as integer,
		LT_No as integer,
		CustID as integer,
		CustName as string,
		HaulerID as string,
		HaulerName as string,
		ScaleHeavy as integer,
		SchPickUpDate as timestamp,
		ActualPickUpDate as timestamp,
		SchDeliveryDate as timestamp,
		ActualDeliveryDate as timestamp,
		RouteNum as string,
		Rejected as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'DataSource',
	wildcardPaths:['*.xlsx']) ~> MIMSservice
